scripts.start: npm install && npm run build:copy-platform-ui && npm run build:parcel && hugo server
scripts.build: npm install && npm run build:copy-platform-ui && npm run build:parcel && hugo
scripts.build:copy-platform-ui: shx mkdir -p assets/js && shx mkdir -p assets/css && shx mkdir -p static/css && shx cp node_modules/@ritterim/platform-ui/dist/platform-icons.eot static/css/platform-icons.eot && shx cp node_modules/@ritterim/platform-ui/dist/platform-icons.svg static/css/platform-icons.svg && shx cp node_modules/@ritterim/platform-ui/dist/platform-icons.ttf static/css/platform-icons.ttf && shx cp node_modules/@ritterim/platform-ui/dist/platform-icons.woff static/css/platform-icons.woff && shx cp node_modules/@ritterim/platform-ui/dist/platform-icons.woff2 static/css/platform-icons.woff2 && shx cp node_modules/@ritterim/platform-ui/dist/platform-ui.min.css assets/css/platform-ui.min.css && shx cp node_modules/@ritterim/platform-ui/dist/js/platform-ui.min.js assets/js/platform-ui.min.js
